
## cleanBinaryImage {.unnumbered}


### Description

Removes alpha channel from png image.



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>cleanBinaryImage(img)
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="img">img</code></td>
<td>
A matrix of 1s and 0s.
</td></tr>
</table>


### Value

png image with the alpha channel removed
